definitions.definition: ( countable ) The main idea or substance , or the most essential part , of a longer or more complicated matter ; the crux , the heart , the pith .
examples: I don't wanna belabor my point; I'm sure you get the gist .

definitions.definition: ( countable , law , dated ) The essential ground for action in a lawsuit , without which there is no cause of action ; the gravamen .
( uncountable , Nigeria ) Gossip , rumour ; ( countable ) an instance of this.
( programming ) A sharable snippet of source code , especially on the version controlled pastebin -hosting site GitHub Gist .

main_definition: ( countable ) The main idea or substance , or the most essential part , of a longer or more complicated matter ; the crux , the heart , the pith .

definitions.definition: A stop for lodging or rest in a journey , or the place where this happens ; a rest.

main_definition: ( obsolete ) A stop for lodging or rest in a journey , or the place where this happens ; a rest.
